Uses of Interface
org.klojang.jdbc.BindInfo

  • Uses of BindInfo in org.klojang.jdbc

    Methods in org.klojang.jdbc with parameters of type BindInfo
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static SQL
    SQL.basic(String sql, BindInfo bindInfo)
    Returns an SQL implementation that allows for named parameters, but not for Klojang Templates variables.
    static SQL
    SQL.skeleton(String sql, BindInfo bindInfo)
    Returns an SQL implementation that allows for named parameters and Klojang Templates variables.
    static SQL
    SQL.template(String sql, BindInfo bindInfo)
    Returns an SQL implementation that allows for named parameters and Klojang Templates variables.
    SQLInsertBuilder
    SQLInsertBuilder.withBindInfo(BindInfo bindInfo)
    Sets the BindInfo object to be used to fine-tune the binding process
